about_the_game:
Are you ready?

Embark on an epic horror experience in an abandoned theater. There are many rumors about this place, but nothing comes close to what is really there.

Story:

A group of friends suffer an accident and end up in an abandoned theater. Your mission is to rescue your friends, but you are not alone. Someone will be hunting you.

Gameplay:

The gameplay is a mix of "Resident Evil" with "Poppy Playtime." You will have to collect resources and fight amidst the chaos that is happening. Not only that, explore and discover more behind this theater, its history and also what really happened.
